meanings.definition: The external part of the ear.
meanings.sent1: She gently touched her auriculas to check for earrings.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her auriculas to see if there was any infection.
meanings.sent3: The auriculas wiggled when she listened intently to the music.
meanings.sent4: His auriculas perked up when he heard his favorite song playing.
meanings.sent5: The auriculas were sensitive to the cold wind, making her shiver.

meanings.definition: A type of primrose plant with brightly colored flowers.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the auriculas bloomed beautifully in various hues.
meanings.sent2: She picked a bouquet of auriculas to brighten up the room.
meanings.sent3: The auriculas seemed to dance in the breeze, showing off their colors.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as vibrant as the auriculas in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The auriculas' petals were as soft as a gentle touch.

meanings.definition: A type of earthenware jug or pitcher.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen shelves displayed colorful auriculas filled with water.
meanings.sent2: She poured lemonade from the ornate auriculas during the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The auriculas clinked together as she arranged them on the table.
meanings.sent4: His collection of auriculas added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: The auriculas' handles were smooth to the touch.
